check-stream.no-nsfw: This stream is marked as mature, and this channel is not NSFW
check-stream.offline: This channel is not currently streaming
check-stream.title: %{streamer} is streaming!

invalid-streamer-name: This name is not a valid Twitch streamer name

subscribe.success: Your server has subscribed to the streamer %{streamer} notifications!
subscribe.limit-reached: You cannot subscribe to more than %{limit} streamers!
subscribe.already-subscribed: The server is already subscribed to %{streamer} streams!

subs-list.title: Subscription list (%{current}/%{max}):
subs-list.empty: This server is not subscribed to any streamer!
subs-list.empty-tip: Use the command %{cmd} to subscribe to up to %{max} streamers.

unsubscribe.success: The server has been unsubscribed from the %{streamer} streams
unsubscribe.not-subscribed: The server is not subscribed to the %{streamer} notifications
